lines.text: Removing her clothes, Alice changed into a costume more befitting her new personality. She now belonged to another society, another world. A world of Pot, LSD and Free Love. Alice Trenton, as her father knew her, was dead. Long Live Alice. She had now become a wild and provocative twinight hippie. Complete with the Indian beads and moccasins.

Alice had a thing for Bob, or Animal as his friends called him for obvious reasons, and she made it known at the party. Here was her chance to prove that she belonged in the sex-for-pleasure inner circle, and prove it she did.
